url.description: URL of the brand's API endpoint.

ticket_form_ids.description: List of IDs for ticket forms associated with the brand.

has_help_center.description: Indicates whether the brand has a help center.

help_center_state.description: State of the help center for the brand.

active.description: Indicates whether the brand is currently active or not.

default.description: Indicates if the brand is the default brand.

is_deleted.description: Indicates if the brand has been deleted.

created_at.description: Timestamp of when the brand was created.

updated_at.description: Timestamp of when the brand was last updated.
